7. saga.adaptor.advert.redis¶

This adaptor interacts with a redis server to implement the advert API semantics.

7.1. Version¶

v0.2

7.2. Supported Schemas¶

  • redis : redis nosql backend.

7.3. Configuration Options¶

enabled

enable / disable saga.adaptor.advert.redis adaptor

  • type : <type ‘bool’>
  • default : True
  • environment : None
  • valid options : [True, False]

7.4. Supported Capabilities¶

7.5. Supported API Classes¶

  • saga.advert.Directory
  • saga.advert.Entry
